title: Warring Kingdom kind of inspired Taliyah skin conceppt

embed.description: A Taliyah skin concept i worked on for the Polycount contest.

body:
Hello! I have been working on this Taliyah skin concept for the polycount contest, I hope you like it ^.^

https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/078/large/olivier-desiree-taliyah-concept-art.jpg?1516833580
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/096/large/olivier-desiree-warring-kingdom-tal.jpg?1516833253
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/113/large/olivier-desiree-vedio.jpg?1516833326
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/144/large/olivier-desiree-r-spell.jpg?1516833419
https://cdna.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/238/large/olivier-desiree-hex.jpg?1516833941
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/211/large/olivier-desiree-recherche-taliyah.jpg?1516833731
https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/050/295/large/olivier-desiree-early-brainstorming.jpg?1516834193

replies.body: This is gorgeous! The idea of her riding a dragon carved of jade for her ult would be so beautiful to see in motion. I love how much thought you put into her hairstyle and outfit, thank you for sharing!!
Wow! Thanks a lot, i'm flattered. I'm a big fan of your work, especially the Risen Lissandra! I'm so glad you like it! <3
Don't just say thank you, save these files and give 'em to the skin team :^)
Be sure to pass it up the chain. See if we can get it made into a skin next year.
Would purchase and play Taliyah more. Great work.
Thanks a lot!
Nice
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
I wish this happened and not the stupid Lux skin :c Taliyah should've been a Lunar Empress :c this skin concept is SUPER nice <3
I would kill to get a Lunar Empress Taliyah.

SAME she deserved it so much more, and the puppy gold headpieces could've been at the ends of her sleeves ;w; ughh her abilities would've been GORGEOUS with jade stones, dragons, lanterns? just bits from Asian culture etc... i'm so salty about this
Start rioting "Faker has more skins than Talyiah"
he literally does xD
This is lovely! Taliyah needs more skins anyway. Too adorable to be ignored.
Totaly agree! Thanks man!

this is the cutest thing everrrrrrr<3

i love all the hair variations you added too. all the options are cute.

100/10!
Anw thank you! <3
OH SHE'S CUTE SHE'S CUTE!
Amazing!
Thank you <3

Wow, that’s impressive!  I main Taliyah and have some questions and comments:

Questions:
1) What does she weave?
2) What does she surf?
3) Does she have a pet?

Comments:
Taliyah has a distinct look, and while it has room for variety, some details should be consistent.  First, her figure should be boyish, with narrower hips, a wider waist, and a flatter chest than she has in your concept sketch.  Second, her clothing should be thick enough to protect her from the bad weather and weaving debris inherent to her life of surfing around Valoran.  Third, you missed some characteristic elements of her character: her outfit should have two layers, along with a mantle and elemental coat tails.  Last, she looks a couple years too young.

Also, the tone and style of the image are inconsistent with her character.  Striking a fun pose with a big smile in a pretty dress is not quite her style.  Her powers terrified her when she was little, and she kept them secret.  Noxus tricked her with promises of learning and told her to bury a sleeping village or drown.  She has watched and helped Yasuo kill men with his sword.  She also had to return from her training early to confront what she had thought were just scary characters from her bedtime stories.  She’s only 16 and still has no idea of where her tribe is.

Maybe if she had been born ordinary, were attending a dance festival with her friends, and knew her crush were there, would we see her as in your picture.  Indeed, I somewhat wish that she could be as happy and carefree as you made her look; for despite her struggles, her lines and lore reveal her irrepressible joy, energy, and humor.  Her original outfit represents this with an Ionian robe around a Shuriman shirt and leggings.  The mantle of stone on her shoulders, likewise, symbolizes the burdens she carries, in her adventures and heart.

For inspiration if you make any changes to your drawing or any other Taliyah skins, I recommend the song _I’m Still Here_, by John Rzenik.  She says the hook of the chorus to herself when you play her, and I imagine that the reference is intentional because the song is loaded with parallels to her story.

https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=Huel7ftd6wM

Wow! Now that's a feedback! Thanks for everything i'm taking notes! First of all i wanted to go completely freestyle with that "fan art". Since at first i was really trying to fit the Taliyah's specs/tropes and things. But it was very hard, i was struggling a lot with the character. Then I just dropped everything and did a freestyle drawing without thinking about anything, just doing my stuff and that's how i came with the 2nd picture. And then i started reading the Riot Game's post about Taliyah concept art and I realised a lot of things you said. Since I didnt really do it as it would be released as a skin, I just went totally freestyle on it. But as I said, i'm taking notes, and everything you said is very interesting, i'll try to work on the concept later on. 

For the questions, there is so much possibility. She can surf on a dragon's head made of jade, a koi karp, she can throw jade rocks, jade knives/kunai or whatever. She could have a dragon flying with her, she can ride a giant dragon made of jade when she R, or she can ride a big chinese wall kind of thing. I haven't really done anything about it yet, just smashing ideas on my sketchbook.

Thanks for everything you're awesome! <3

> [{quoted}](name=Capi974,realm=EUW,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=pnYBVUcA,comment-id=000d0000,timestamp=2018-01-25T23:34:20.367+0000)

She could have a dragon flying with her, she can ride a giant dragon made of jade when she R, or she can ride a big chinese wall kind of thing. I haven't really done anything about it yet, just smashing ideas on my sketchbook.

You’re welcome! :)  I hope to see you work on this concept.  Taliyah is a complex, layered character who is enriching to work with.
